test-set.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingB
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Roaming, RS: Free-ranging Any step expression selecting streamed nodes on the following(-sibling) or preceding(-sibling) axis is roaming and free-ranging

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingB001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: following, following-sibling, preceding, preceding-sibling With node types: element, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingB002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: ex:foo Separators: / With axes: following, following-sibling, preceding, preceding-sibling With node types: element, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none
